recommendations: Arnav Yadav â€œWeâ€™ve worked together on several projects and Komal is one of the best people to have as a teammate. I have known her to be diligent, since and highly enthusiastic in all her endeavours. Her ability to solve financial problems helped us during difficult assignments and we were able to innovate. Out of all her great qualities, her curiosity to keep learning more inspires me the most.â€

Tanya Seth â€œKomal is an extremely good communicator and great colleague to work with. Komal and I have been college mates and have interned in the same organization. It has always been a delight to know about finance, consulting and strategy from Komal. She has always aced all college events with her management and leadership skills. She has extraordinary attention to detail and I look forward to work with her again.â€

volunteer_experience.info:
Enactus is an international organization that connects student, academic and business leaders through entrepreneurial-based projects that empower people to transform opportunities into real, sustainable progress for themselves and their communities. It is a non-profit student run organization spread across 37 countries that aims to empower underprivileged communities by implementing sustainable business models.Worked on a diverse range of social and environmental projects includingâ€¦

          Enactus is an international organization that connects student, academic and business leaders through entrepreneurial-based projects that empower people to transform opportunities into real, sustainable progress for themselves and their communities. It is a non-profit student run organization spread across 37 countries that aims to empower underprivileged communities by implementing sustainable business models.Worked on a diverse range of social and environmental projects including digital literary, sanitation awareness and clean water initiative.
